item.description: Last night at the comedy club, (great time, btw) a few of us thought we'd like to put together a meetup for tonight. If you're free and would like to join us, we're thinking of a Moody Street eatery. I'll check rsvp's until 5p or so. Leave a restaurant choice for the rest of us to think about. Check your e-mail updates or leave me your cell. Let's make this happen tonight!! - diana

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Last Minute Dinner - Tonight - Waltham Area
